abstract: Community Service Society of New York, one of eight organizations supported by New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Natasha Bell buy living room furniture for her new home and pay for monthly MetroCard.

headline.print_headline: In Debt, but Undaunted, a Mother Finds Her Home

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Natasha Bell has worked many jobs, trying to piece together financial security for her family. After living in a shelter, she now has a home, but still has debts to pay....
lead_paragraph: Natasha Bell has worked many jobs, trying to piece together financial security for her family. After living in a shelter, she now has a home, but still has debts to pay.
